title: Optional.ifPresentOrElse()
summary: Handle both present and empty cases of Optional in one call.
explanation: ifPresentOrElse() takes a Consumer for the present case and a Runnable for the empty case. It avoids the isPresent/get anti-pattern.

whyModernWins.title: Single expression
whyModernWins.desc: Both cases handled in one method call.

whyModernWins.title: No get()
whyModernWins.desc: Eliminates the dangerous isPresent() + get() pattern.

whyModernWins.title: Fluent
whyModernWins.desc: Chains naturally after findUser() or any Optional-returning method.
